auction.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a public meeting where land, buildings, paintings etc are sold to the person who offers the most money for them
auction.translation[0].definitions[0].no: auction house (=a company that arranges auctions)
auction.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: This week 14 of his paintings were put up for auction.
The house was sold at auction.
auction.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to sell something at an auction
auction.translation[2].definitions[0].de: a public meeting where land, buildings, paintings etc are sold to the person who offers the most money for them
auction.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: Sotheby’s estimated that its Impressionist paintings auction would take in about $80 million.
The buildings will be sold at auction next month.
auction.translation[2].definitions[1].de: to offer something for sale in an auction
auction.translation[2].definitions[1].ex: The house was put up for auction.
auction.translation[3].definitions[0].de: to offer something for sale at an auction
auction.translation[3].definitions[0].ex: Fleet arranged to auction off the company’s inventory and equipment.
